title: Infant Vaccine Quiz
description: A pregnant woman passes antibodies to her unborn baby through the placenta to protect against certain diseases. How long does this natural immunity last?
cleaned_text: Need care now? Covenant Health's Virtual Urgent Care is available 24/7. Start a visit now. 244 Fort Sanders West Blvd. Knoxville, TN 37922 Test your knowledge of vaccines against a variety of diseases that can affect your child. This quiz is based on information from the CDC.
